{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Belkin F5D7130-4 01a.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless G Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = http://www.belkin.com/us/support-product?rnId=375 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Belkin_F5D7230-4_v4 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Belkin |model = F5D7230-4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v4 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = F5D7230-4 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = K7SF5D7230A |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88W8510; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = 9 |cpu1spd = 160 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV800BTTC-70; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM636165TS-6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6060; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:50 |oui = 00:11:50
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 4.5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Marvell-AP32,belkin54g |defaultssid_regex = ^Marvell-AP32$,,,^belkin54g$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/19/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Marvell;88W8010; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "4900RZ00B" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos and the below board image from the DD-WRT forums.
[http://www.seattlewireless.net/Belkin_F5D7230-4 F5D7230-4 series on SeattleWireless] :''On reboot, network with SSID 'marvell-ap32' can be seen'' - this is assumed to instead be '''Marvell-AP32''' based on WiGLE data, which is also used by [http://en.techinfodepot.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Special:Ask?title=Special%3AAsk&q=%5B%5BDefault+SSID%3A%3AMarvell-AP32%5D%5D&po=%3FFCC+ID%0D%0A%3FManuf%0D%0A%3FManuf+product+model%0D%0A%3FCPU1+model%0D%0A%3FFLA1+amount%0D%0A%3FRAM1+amount%0D%0A%3FSwitch+model%0D%0A%3FRadio1+chip1+model%0D%0A%3FDefault+SSID%0D%0A&sort%5B0%5D=&order%5B0%5D=ASC&sort_num=&order_num=ASC&eq=yes&p%5Bformat%5D=broadtable&p%5Blimit%5D=500&p%5Bsort%5D=&p%5Boffset%5D=&p%5Bheaders%5D=show&p%5Bmainlabel%5D=&p%5Blink%5D=all&p%5Bsearchlabel%5D=&p%5Bintro%5D=&p%5Boutro%5D=&p%5Bdefault%5D=&p%5Bclass%5D=sortable+wikitable+smwtable&eq=yes other routers based on the Marvell AP-32 reference design] :Default SSID: belkin54g
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=29730 Board image on the DD-WRT forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=303356 Some specs mentioned on the DD-WRT forums] (which is all visible in the board image below)
==Pictures== <center>'''ver 4000tt ([http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=29730 from wimpi on the DD-WRT forums])''' <gallery> File:F5D7230-4 4000tt board top.jpg|board top File:F5D7230-4 4000tt board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
